Package maltcms.commands.distances

Interface Summary
IArrayComp<T extends Array,U> Interface to define classes, comparing arrays, especially mass spectra by some function and returning a generic type as result.
IArrayDoubleComp  
IRecurrence Interface for classes performing a recurring operation, e.g. dynamic programming.
ListDistanceFunction Interface to allow the values of comparison of multiple arrays to also be used as a cost/score measure.
 

Class Summary
Array2DTimePenalized Time penalized Dot/Cos distance.
ArrayCorr Calculates Pearson's product moment correlation as similarity between arrays.
ArrayCos Cosine similarity between arrays.
ArrayCosLp Combinded distance of ArrayCos and ArrayLp.
ArrayCov Calculates Pearson's product moment correlation as similarity between arrays.
ArrayDot Dot product as similarity measure between arrays.
ArrayDotLp  
ArrayDotMap Calculates the dotmap, but instead of the weighting by mz bin this class uses the standard deviation.
ArrayHamming Hamming distance between binary vectors.
ArrayLp Lp-norm based distance between arrays.
ArrayRankCorr Calculates Spearman's rank correlation as similarity between arrays.
ArrayTanimoto Implementation of Tanimoto score.
ArrayTimePenalizedDot FIXME requires citation of paper
ArrayTimePenalizedRankCorr Calculates Spearman's rank correlation as similarity between arrays.
ArrayTimePenalizedWeightedCosine  
ArrayVarNormLp Implementation of normalized Euclidean distance.
ArrayWeightedCosine  
CumulativeDistance Objects of this type are used to calculate the cumulative distance within the ADynamicTimeWarp Implementations.
PairwiseDistance Class used to calculate a pairwise score or cost between mass-spectra.
